review: So easy to set up & use.Comes with cord so don't know why it would be suggested at check out.Hook up to your wifi & chromecast reads the network for you & activates.My quick tip, pick up an app called  TV Cast (chrom.) with a blue tv icon.You can go to most sites, if you don't have cable or have a basic package,  and stream  thru this app so you don't have to pay evil cable company monopoly!Love that I can now watch EWTN & ESPN thru the TvCast app!Wooooo!!
